actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of a proposed boundary expansion of the George Rogers Clark National Historical Park in Vincennes, Indiana, and for other purposes.
short_title: George Rogers Clark National Historical Park Expansion Study Act

summary.text: George Rogers Clark National Historical Park Expansion Study Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the National Park Service, to study and report to specified congressional committees on a proposed expansion of the boundaries of the George Rogers Clark National Historical Park to include certain lands owned by the city of Vincennes, Indiana. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: George Rogers Clark National Historical Park Expansion Study Act
A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of a proposed boundary expansion of the George Rogers Clark National Historical Park in Vincennes, Indiana, and for other purposes.
